title: Euw servers down?
body: Just got disconnected from a ranked game.

replies.body: Hey, I haven't heard anything about this.  Were you able to reconnect to the game?
No, i wasn't even able to login to my account!

If this is still an issue then something might be blocking your network from getting back to our servers.  Check out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help stabilize whatever initially caused this.

Was in a Ranked flex game and got dc'd and my EUW ping timed out even though my internet was perfectly fine. Was able to reconnect only 2 minuses ago but the game was lost and I received the LP loss. Is there anything to do about this?

We aren't able to adjust LP losses, even if we wanted to.  It would break the ladder.  :/  I'm not seeing any issues with our servers, meaning technically Leaverbuster acted accordingly by applying a loss.  If you want to toss me some more details, we could get a better idea of what exactly happened, and if it is something with our server then EU support might be able to make considerations.

Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the EUW server 192.64.170.252 for about five minutes.  Let me know what you find, but also be careful about queueing for another matchmade game until we're sure everything is okay.
